content:
Punyamezhum sleebaa!-aathmavishuddhathayum
Paapavimochanavum-nyangallkkekaname
Dushdane veezhtthi jayam-sleebaa nalkukayaal
Than bhakthanmaar thal-smrthiyil thoshippoo
/thaaleluyyaa-haaleluyyaa
Nin sleebaachirakil-kaakkanamadiyaare.
(naathhaa ee nin janmatthin naallil ... Enna pole)

/Tnithyam vadane sleebaayin-
/trooshmaa kutthunnu nyangall.
/tnaasham vanchathiyiva neekki-
/tthal balamadiyaare kaakkum.
Sleebaathan rooshmaa siddhan-kaattumpoll mumpil ninnum
Kaattil ninnum podi pole-saatthaan paanyodeedunnu
/taakalkkarusaayin daasyaal
/tsrshdikalle sleebaa veendu.

/tjnyaanatthin tharuvaal
/tmarthyan parudeesaa vittodippoy,
/tsleebaayin tharuvaal nyangall
/tpoorvvasthhaanam praapichu.
Aadyaadatthaal shikshitharaam-nyangalle mashihaa rakshichu
Mariyaam moolam nirmmalaraayu jeevasthhaanam kandetthi.
/tjeernnichorkku puthukkatthe
/tnalkiya nin krpa samsthuthyam.
